workflow: MISSION: 1. Login. 2. Navigate to PIM module and Add a new employee (FirstNameTest LastNameTest). 3. Click SAVE to finish onboarding. 4. Navigate to Admin module -> User Management -> Users. 5. Create a System User for the newly created employee. THE MISSION IS ONLY SUCCESSFUL IF ALL STEPS ARE COMPLETED.

trace.thought: The goal is to log in to the OrangeHRM platform. The current page is the login page. I need to fill in the username and password fields and click the login button. According to the knowledge bank, I should wait for the username field to be visible before filling it.

The current page is the login page. The goal is to first login, then navigate to PIM, add an employee, save, navigate to Admin, and create a system user. I have already filled the username. Now I need to fill the password.
I am on the login page and have already filled the username and password. The next step is to click the login button to proceed to the dashboard. This addresses step 1 of the goal: Login.

The goal is to navigate to the PIM module. The previous steps were successful in logging in. Now, I need to click on the PIM module link to proceed to the next step of adding a new employee. I will use the proven locator for the PIM link on the DashboardPage.

I am currently on the OrangeHRM Dashboard page. The goal is to navigate to the PIM module to add a new employee. According to the knowledge bank, the 'PIM' link is a stable locator on the dashboard page. I will click on the PIM link to navigate to the PIM module.
I am currently on the Employee List page, which is part of the PIM module. The goal is to add a new employee. Therefore, I need to click the 'Add' button to navigate to the 'Add Employee' page.

The goal is to add a new employee with the name 'FirstNameTest LastNameTest' and then save. I am currently on the 'Add Employee' page, so I need to fill in the first name, middle name, and last name fields with the appropriate values, then click the save button. According to the page context, the 'Save' button is present. I will use the element IDs 121, 122, and 123 to fill the first name, middle name, and last name respectively. Then I will click the save button with id 128.

I am currently on the Add Employee page and have already filled in the first name. The next step is to fill in the last name, as per the goal. I will use the 'lastName' locator from the knowledge bank.

The goal is to add a new employee and then create a system user for them. I have already filled in the first name and last name. Now I need to click the Save button to proceed to the next step, which is to navigate to the Admin module.

The goal is to complete the onboarding process by clicking the 'Save' button on the 'Add Employee' page. The previous action was clicking the 'Save' button, so I need to verify that the action was successful. According to the knowledge bank, after clicking 'Save' on the Add Employee page, SUCCESS is defined by the appearance of the 'Personal Details' page or a success toast. Since the current page is still 'Add Employee', it means the save was not successful. I will click the save button again.

The goal is to complete the following steps: 1. Login. 2. Navigate to PIM module and Add a new employee (FirstNameTest LastNameTest). 3. Click SAVE to finish onboarding. 4. Navigate to Admin module -> User Management -> Users. 5. Create a System User for the newly created employee. I have already completed steps 1, 2, and 3. The current page is the Personal Details page for the newly added employee. The next step is to navigate to the Admin module. I will click the 'Admin' link to navigate to the Admin module.

The goal is to create a System User for the newly created employee. The current page is the Admin module. The next step is to navigate to User Management -> Users. Since I am already on the Admin page, I need to find the 'User Management' option and then 'Users'. I don't see any elements on the page, so I will navigate to the User Management page.

The goal is to create a System User for the newly created employee. I am currently on the Admin module -> User Management -> Users page. The next step is to click the 'Add' button to create a new user.

I am currently on the 'Add User' page, which is part of the 'Admin' module. The goal requires me to create a System User for the newly created employee. I need to click the 'Save' button to finalize the user creation.
